content: my octo ollie mini crochet octopus pattern is perfect for crocheters of all skill levels this no-sew pattern offers easy-to-follow instructions that guide you through each step of creating a tiny adorable octopus plushie ideal for gifts market sellers or cute keychains this pattern is as close to instant satisfaction as it gets with crochet can be made in under 20 minutes **features ** easy-to-follow instructions suitable for beginners and experienced crocheters alike video tutorial included step-by-step video guidance with captions to ensure you can follow along easily adorable customizable design make your mini octopus unique with your choice of colors perfect for gifting or selling finished size is conveniently compact 1 25 inches tall x 1 75 inches wide ideal for gifting selling or turning into keychains **materials needed ** 3 25 mm d crochet hook ricorumi nilli nilli yarn 100% polyester dk weight 71 yds/65 m per 25 g skein approx 13 yds used colors light blue 014 blue 013 6mm black safety eyes scissors tapestry needle stitch markers scrap yarn polyfil stuffing **language ** english **skill level ** easy **what s included ** detailed written instructions access to a full video tutorial with captions **stay connected ** don t miss out on any updates or behind-the-scenes peeks of new designs follow me on social media instagram www instagram com/theloopylamb
